General.Name: Sun Peak Metals Corp
General.Description: Sun Peak Metals Corp., a junior mining company, engages in the acquisition, exploration, and development of resource properties for the mining of precious and base metals in Ethiopia. It explores for gold and copper deposits. The company holds interests in the Shire project that comprises exploration licenses, including Nefasit, Adi Dairo, Terer, and Meli located in northern Ethiopia. Sun Peak Metals Corp. was incorporated in 2016 and is headquartered in White Rock, Canada.
General.Address: Unit 1, White Rock, BC, Canada, V4B 1E6
